attributes.action: Build a new skatepark in the borough of brent.
attributes.additional_details: Today i was skating outside the Wembley arena and security kicked me out. From where i live (in Brent) it would take me around 40 minutes on some days to get to a skatepark to enjoy myself. People should not have to teavel long distances to enjoy themselves. Please sign this petition to help the skate/scooter/BMX/ community.
attributes.background: There aren’t many skateparks in Brent. This means you might have to travel long distances to get to a skatepark. This leads skateboarders, BMX riders, scooter riders and others to skate on private property and cause damage which can get them in trouble.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The provision of skate parks is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
